name: parathion,NADPH---hemoprotein reductase:oxygen oxidoreductase (paraoxon-forming)
definition: Parathion + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Oxygen <=> Paraoxon + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + Sulfur + H2O
comment: The product sulfur is reactive (e.g. forming hydrodisulfide with cysteine residue)
